
### some definitions  {.smaller}


* <em>mutual exclusion</em>: ensuring only one thread does a particular thing at a time 

   * like updating shared balance

* <em>critical section</em>: code that exactly one thread can execute at a time 

   * result of mutual exclusion

* <em>lock</em>: object only one thread can hold at a time 

   * interface for creating critical sections
